author: gballet
content:
to build on what Kev and Tim said, with VTs the storage for all accounts are present in the same tree, and there is no mapping from a storage slot back to its account (unless you can get a preimage from its hash, which hopefully you can't). So it's not possible to find all the storage slots to delete.

Passing all the storage slots in a tx isn't practical, an accounts could have gigabytes of data. And we can't accept only a fraction of the storage to be deleted, lest it creates a lot of strange effects if a contract is redeployed at the same address with `CREATE2`.
